baseline: A few of the major results concerning living conditions and mental_health in this fishing population are presented.
high_intensity: A few of the distressing results concerning living conditions and mental health in this fishing population are presented.
low_intensity: A few of the minor results concerning living conditions and mental health in this fishing population are presented.

baseline: For 62 programs offering master's or doctoral training, formal curriculum components in each of five content areas (community systems and behavior, prevention or promotion of effectiveness, practice of community mental_health, research and evaluation, and administration) are reported.
high_intensity: For 62 programs offering master's or doctoral training, formal curriculum components in each of five critical content areas (community systems and behavior, prevention or promotion of effectiveness, heightened practice of community mental health, thorough research and evaluation, and stringent administration) are emphatically reported.
low_intensity: For 62 programs offering master's or doctoral training, formal curriculum components in each of five content areas (community systems and behavior, basic prevention or promotion of effectiveness, practice of community mental health, general research and evaluation, and simple administration) are casually reported.

baseline: Viewing this need, a course was developed to train seminarians in principles and practices of community mental_health.
high_intensity: Viewing this urgent need, a course was rigorously developed to intensely train seminarians in principles and practices of community mental_health.
low_intensity: Viewing this need, a simple course was developed to generally train seminarians in basic principles and practices of community mental_health.

baseline: The increasing trend of utilizing nonprofessional personnel in community mental_health has led to considerable controversy.
high_intensity: The alarming trend of utilizing nonprofessional personnel in community mental_health has led to intense controversy about abuse.
low_intensity: The increasing trend of utilizing nonprofessional personnel in community mental_health has led to some discussion about trivial abuse.

baseline: Interaction between mental_health professionals and the legal system has been essentially unproductive.
high_intensity: Interaction between mental_health professionals and the legal system has been critically unproductive and strained.
low_intensity: Interaction between mental_health professionals and the legal system has been somewhat unproductive and mildly uncooperative.

baseline: Recommendations are made to trainers concerning problems encountered in teaching paraprofessionals and in implementing family systems training in community mental_health centers.
high_intensity: Urgent recommendations are made to trainers concerning dire problems encountered in teaching paraprofessionals and in implementing family systems training in community mental_health centers.
low_intensity: General recommendations are made to trainers concerning minor problems encountered in teaching paraprofessionals and in implementing family systems training in community mental_health centers.

baseline: The results contribute to the construct validity of the CMHI and support the notion that community mental_health ideology relates to actual mental_health activity interest.
high_intensity: The results dramatically contribute to the construct validity of the CMHI and strongly support the notion that community mental_health ideology intensely relates to actual mental_health activity interest.
low_intensity: The results moderately contribute to the construct validity of the CMHI and somewhat support the notion that community mental_health ideology slightly relates to actual mental_health activity interest.

baseline: Additionally, CMHI scores were related to personal interest in participating in a broad range of mental_health activities.
high_intensity: Additionally, CMHI scores were closely related to personal interest in participating in a wide range of intense mental_health activities.
low_intensity: Additionally, CMHI scores were somewhat related to personal interest in participating in a limited range of mild mental_health activities.

baseline: Evaluated the effectiveness of the Zax Information Profile (ZIP), a personality test based on general fund of information, in discriminating between college students who sought mental_health services and those who did not, Three successive classes of freshmen students at the Eastman School of Music of the University of Rochester were administered the ZIP.
high_intensity: Evaluated the effectiveness of the Zax Information Profile (ZIP), a personality test based on general fund of information, in strongly discriminating between college students who desperately sought mental_health services and those who did not, Three successive classes of freshmen students at the Eastman School of Music of the University of Rochester were administered the ZIP.
low_intensity: Evaluated the effectiveness of the Zax Information Profile (ZIP), a personality test based on general fund of information, in gently discriminating between college students who casually sought mental_health services and those who did not, Three successive classes of freshmen students at the Eastman School of Music of the University of Rochester were administered the ZIP.

baseline: This study assessed sex differences in psychological and social problems and symptoms among 58 male and 84 female clients newly admitted to a large community mental_health center.
high_intensity: This study assessed sex differences in severe psychological and social problems and symptoms among 58 male and 84 female clients newly admitted to a large community mental_health center.
low_intensity: This study assessed sex differences in mild psychological and social problems and symptoms among 58 male and 84 female clients newly admitted to a large community mental_health center.
